TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void InputEventHandler(object sender, InputEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed InputEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub InputEventHandler(sender As Object, e As InputEventArgs)
public delegate void InputEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, InputEventArgs ^ e);
type InputEventHandler = delegate of obj * InputEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示处理输入相关路由事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles input related routed events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中的现有事件都不使用 委托。No existing event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the delegate. 此类的事件数据类型 ，它是用于输入的更多特定事件数据类的基类。The event data type for this class, , is the base class for various more specific event data classes for input. 定义常见的输入事件的事件数据属性，而不考虑启动事件的设备。 defines the event data properties of input events that are common regardless of the device that initiated the event. 使用派生的事件数据并与现有输入事件对应的委托的示例。An example of a delegate that uses derived event data and that corresponds to an existing input event is .
